name: UFGRailroadFunctionLibrary
comment: Function library for railroad related functions.

methods.name: IsValid
methods.comment: @return Is this a valid track position.

methods.name: GetTrack
methods.comment:
The track segment this position is on.
@return Track if valid position; otherwise null.

methods.name: GetWorldLocationAndDirection
methods.comment: Get the world location and direction of this track position. Zero vectors if the track is not valid.
